content: As Mr. Yan mentioned, we delivered a record growth in 2022 particularly in the fourth quarter, our loan origination volume grew by 249.2% to RMB18.9 billion as we refined our partnership operations and improved our funding efficiency. So, we are focusing on organic growth at this point by introducing and â introducing and higher quality â credit quality customers through a more competitive acquisition channels and bundled with more competitive product offerings through these channels to these new customers in helping that to grow our overall customer portfolios as well as to deliver a healthy risk factor â risk metrics. Similarly, in the product offerings, we are going to match the product in terms â specifically to the loan interest rates from our institution â financial institution partners with higher â lower interest rate products to our new customers in order to attract the right customer segments to our platforms.
